slideInfo.title: HOW does Asimov reveal his attitude toward technology?

pButton.Name: Claim 1
pButton.popInfo: II. Body Paragraph First Claim: This is an eerie scene.

pButton.Name: Claim 2
pButton.popInfo: III. Body Paragraph Second Claim: Powell is unsure, doubtful, anxious about the robot.

pButton.Name: Claim 3
pButton.popInfo: IV. Body Paragraph Third Claim: It’s ironic that the robot seems to be in control of the situation.
